thread.title: Daddy Potter! Harry has son in new play
thread.title_full: Daddy Potter! Harry has son in new play

title: Daddy Potter! Harry has son in new play
text: Daddy Potter! Harry has son in new play 1:38 AM AP and Network writers THE first-ever Harry Potter play is set to hit the stage and will be a magical sequel, telling the story of a grown-up Harry and his young son. Patty’s latest may also be her greatest 1:00 AM Edited by Noel Mengel ALBUM REVIEWS: Patty Griffin does not do less than great, but her latest may be her greatest yet. PLUS: Boy & Bear, Jill Scott, Soilwork, Caligula’s Horse, The Necks and Guitar Trek Rose Byrne ‘expecting first child’ 0:53 AM Network Writers AUSTRALIAN Rose Byrne is reportedly pregnant with her first child to partner Bobby Cannavale. See her cute baby bump pictures. Sam Armytage takes a reality check 0:00 AM By Siobhan Duck and Colin Vickery AS Sunrise co-host Sam Armytage heads towards 40, she talks Botox, dating, paparazzi pain and that vicious rumour campaign by ‘the sisterhood’. ‘My depression is a poisonous dread’ 22:31 PM Victoria Craw FORMER Savage Garden singer Darren Hayes has opened up about his battle with depression in a lengthy Facebook post about his illness. Burt won’t keep up with Kardashians 18:44 PM Kathleen Skene HE’S a member of the world’s most famous family but Burt Jenner, who is on the Gold Coast for the GC600, is thankful he was sidelined from the reality television juggernaut. Adele’s new single: first review 18:05 PM Cameron Adams National music writer THREE years after her last hit, Adele is back with her new single, Hello, ahead of the worldwide launch of her third studio album, 25. Rihanna rumour caused Beyonce and Jay Z to split 17:21 PM Carlos Greer THE author of an unauthorised biography of Beyoncé says that despite rumours that Jay Z cheated, Bey would never tolerate it. Harry Potter play set for London stage debut October 24, 2015 1:02am New play ... British author JK Rowling’s creation has now spawned a play. Picture: Suzanne Plunkett AP and Network writers News Corp Australia Network Share
